title: Mike Sielski: "The Rise"
description: Michael's conversation with Philadelphia Inquirer Columnist Mike Sielski, on his book "The Rise: Kobe Bryant and the Pursuit of Immortality." Original air date 12 January 2022. The book was published on 11 January 2022.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Mike Sielski, Michael Smerconish)
